title: Text message transfer failed during setup with USB Quick Switch. Now what??
content:
Transferring data from my old galaxy s7 to new pixel 3 during setup.  At the end of setup, it said it failed to transfer my text messages over. I really would like my old text messages on my new phone. What do I do now??
All my apps and everything are already setup, so I don't really want to wipe and restart. 

How can I transfer my texts? 
Also, if there is a way to transfer over the MMSs too that would be awesome. 
Thanks!
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3
